meanings.sent1: She felt unharried as she strolled through the peaceful park.
meanings.sent2: The unharried cat napped lazily in the warm sun.
meanings.sent3: The unharried squirrel casually collected acorns without a care in the world.
meanings.sent4: His unharried demeanor in the face of chaos was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unharried atmosphere of the spa instantly relaxed her tense muscles.

meanings.sent1: The unharried pace of the countryside was a welcome change from the city.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the unharried walk along the quiet beach at sunset.
meanings.sent3: The unharried snail made its way slowly across the garden path.
meanings.sent4: The unharried flow of the river mirrored his calm approach to life.
meanings.sent5: The unharried clouds drifted lazily across the sky, painting a serene picture.
